reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: UN; OHCHR; Human Rights Special Procedures

description.narrative: Support to the human rights Special Procedures that are mandated under the UN Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR). Finland allocates funding to the work of the mandates on the basis of its human rights and development policy priorities . Total amount of funding in 2020 will be 300 000 EUR and will be earmarked inter alia to the Special Rapporteur on the rights of persons with disabilities and the Special Rapporteur on Exterme Poverty. Through the Finnish fund reducing inequaliaty and enh ancing rights and possibilities of persons in a particularly vulnerable situation are supported.

Support to the human rights Special Procedures that are mandated under the UN Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR). Finland allocates funding to the work of the mandates on the basis of its human rights and development policy priorities . Total amount of funding in 2020 will be 300 000 EUR and will be earmarked inter alia to the Special Rapporteur on the rights of persons with disabilities and the Special Rapporteur on Exterme Poverty. Through the Finnish fund reducing inequaliaty and enh ancing rights and possibilities of persons in a particularly vulnerable situation are supported.

tag.narrative: Improving democracy in societies is the main priority area in this activity
